Direct Known Subclasses:
MapElementView
public class HtmlPopupPanel
extends com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.DecoratedPopupPanel

Subclass of DecoratedPopupPanel - displays HTML content in a popup panel that disappears after a specific time interval when the mouse leaves the popup frame.

Author:
jtbates
